project.description: Test freestyle project to demonstrate dynamic Kubernetes agents

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "üöÄ Freestyle Project - Dynamic Agent Test" echo "=========================================="
echo "üìã Build Information:" echo " Job Name: $JOB_NAME" echo " Build Number: $BUILD_NUMBER" echo " Node Name: $NODE_NAME" echo " Workspace: $WORKSPACE"
echo "" echo "üñ•Ô∏è System Information:" echo " Hostname: $(hostname)" echo " Current User: $(whoami)" echo " Current Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "" echo "üíæ Resource Information:" echo " Memory Info:" cat /proc/meminfo | head -3
echo "" echo "‚è±Ô∏è Test Duration:" for i in {1..3}; do echo " Step $i/3: Processing..." sleep 3 echo " - Current time: $(date)" done
echo "" echo "‚úÖ Freestyle test completed!"
